website_summaries.verdict: An excellent set containing 10 of the main characters from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.
pros: Gives kids all the characters they love in one set
cons: Some reports of quality issues, but this only seems to affect a handful of sets

customer_reviews.title: More pony for our money...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter absolutely loves these! We saw a similar set at Costco for a little bit cheaper but decided to go with this set for Christmas because it included all of the ponies my kiddo wanted and Spike. These ponies were also bigger so we felt like we got more for our money. The quality is great and the packaging wasn't too difficult to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D Hansard

customer_reviews.title: Good size for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these pony's, they are larger than other brands and the hair can also be brushed without coming out to tangling. The wings are glued on but it has not been a problem, they are very durable. Having the set has been great for my daughter games and she likes to reenact the tv show. I do with that Apple Jack came with a hat though, that was a bit of a problem for may daughter and I had to make a cardboard one. We had them sent out internationally and the postage was more than the gift, but it has still be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mjc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find. BIG!
customer_reviews.text: Got this product at an excellent price. Bought as a Christmas gift and was shocked to see just how big they are which I actually love. My sister is very excited for her daughter (my niece) to receive it. Perfect for little hands and will likely not get lost as they are so big. Plus one of the only sets with Celestia and spike.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Briggs

customer_reviews.title: What a gorgeous set!
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with these ponies! I was afraid they would be too large but they truly are just the right size and gorgeously constructed. Looking forward to hours of playtime fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. T

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters 3rd birthday and it totally trumped grandma's gift of princesses. They are nicely sized. Not little dinky ponies. The colors are bright and match the show perfectly. They also have a soft feel to them, not a hard, slick feel. My daughter has been playing with these for months now and they are just as fun today as they were 5 months ago. She keeps coming back to them. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: My 3 and 5 year old daughters love them.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, quality seems decent my girls love them, I just need to find more of the same kind in the other characters and accessories to match. The only thing they add missing is a brush for their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Lasher

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, high quality set. It's great to find a pony set with the mane six and the princesses included. The ponies are all good quality and the crows stay on the princesses much better than in some other sets. The only tiny issue is that the angle of the pegasus wings makes it hard to brush their hair.
customer_reviews.author: K. Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Great Add to the Collection!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I are huge Pony fans. I have been eyeing this set since last year and finally jumped the gun and bought it. It is such a huge and great set for Pony fans. The ponies are huge! If you're suing this for play the ponies are huge and great for those who are cautious about the smaller sized ponies with your toddlers/preschoolers. If you are using this for collecting, you will not be disappointed as it has the mane six PLUS Cadence, Celestia and Luna. If you have the wonderbolts set then this is very similar!
customer_reviews.author: HardCayndae

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Great bigger than i thought... that happens a lot to me I just buy and not read what size they are... i thought they woule be the small ones that come in the suprise packs that are like palm size... well they are decently bigger.. so had to recognize all the toys so they had a place and didn't end up everywhere. My daughter loves the. The crowns are lost as they are removable. Probably under the couch or something. They can withstand being chucked in anger across the house when you step on one at 3am going to the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Great set for many long hours of pony play !
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old seen these at Target and threw a fit . She’s a pony fanatic! There was no way this momma was paying $70 for them . Kept an eye out and scored a great deal on cyber Monday. She got them Christmas morning and hasn’t stopped playing with them since . Which drives my 16 and 18!year old children crazy bc they are the lucky ones who get to play with them too . We like the size of them as they are bigger then the others she has.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Insane price for plastic toys
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set, but good lord is it expensive. You know when you buy this what you are getting, I just hope you get it cheaper than I did. Wish I could have waited for a sale or something, but this was a must get for Christmas. The toys seem nice and hold up fine to playing. I am just shocked at the retail msrp and the price this sells for on the internet most days.
customer_reviews.author: Stupid People are Annoying

customer_reviews.title: The best MLP collection!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as many of the collections as I could for Christmas for my 5 year old, but this one by far was the best one. The price is a little up there, but if you don't have the luxury of forking up the cash for this collection, I recommend waiting for it to go on sale. I purchased mine on a Black Friday deal for half off and saw it at a later time also on sale so just keep price checking. I'm telling you all, this is SO worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loved getting these ponies for Christmas! I was very pleased to find that the ponies are good sized, I would say the size of a hand. She hasn’t stopped playing with them and loves having all of them, plus, Spike. Kind of pricey, but well worth it for the look on her face.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieC

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loved these! I was a little skeptical thinking they would be small (as all the other trendy toys little girls love right now) but they aren't. So you really get your money's worth, in my opinion. The colors are beautiful and bright. If you have a MLP obsessed kiddo just buy them you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: It's a lovely figure
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely figure. My son loves so much. So I'm getting better pony.
customer_reviews.author: jang bobae

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter who loves my little pony. She loved this and immediately had to have them removed from the package so she could play with them. They are a little larger than normal and I had gotten them on sale. It was worth it to see her face when she opened her gift.
customer_reviews.author: denabo

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on prime day because of the great deal. I won’t be opening because it will be a Xmas gift but the packaging is very nice and from what I can see the ponies look durable and have great color. The size is great can’t wait for my daughter to open this. Great gift for any My Little Pony fan
customer_reviews.author: Delgado

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: These where a lot bigger than I expected. They where bought as a birthday gift for my 3 year old an all three of my kids ( 7 girl , 4 boy, 3 girl ) love to play with these. Although my boy likes to play with them like they are dinosaurs lol
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful child toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter's Christmas present and the look on her face when she received it was priceless! the other girls were extremely jealous that she received that and they did not I wish I would have bought two more!
customer_reviews.author: Sharringvasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for oldest daughter. She actually requested it. She loves her my little pony. I thought it was great deal. They are made just like I remembered when I had my own. Very durable. My youngest wanted one too. So I ordered her one also.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Cute ponies
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these toys. The heads turn, and the crowns come off. If you have kids that lose things easily, you might want to confiscate the crowns until they learn to keep track of things. The hair is plasticky, so it's difficult to brush, but we braided some and left others twisted. They don't mind at all. (And pinky pie looks like herself with the frazzled hair. Lol) Good sized toys if you've got mlp fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy with great savings!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is about $30 at Target or Walmart so I was happy to find it on here for much less. My daughter loved it! Great for any My Little Pony fan!
customer_reviews.author: Natolie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than they should be, but my daughter really enjoys them
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive for what you get, but the figures themselves are a very fun size. Our daughter loved opening them and playing with them on Christmas. So I guess the price was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nash

customer_reviews.title: Super Pack of Little Ponies.
customer_reviews.text: If your child loves my little ponies then this is the gift for them. They are the perfect size and has the entire cast. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I Don't know if its really worth the price of $54.00, but i got on cyber deal day for $34.00 and figured id give them a try, They are large and cute! Will be played with a lot i'm sure. They are a Christmas gift, so once she opens them i will post more. Overall big win!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: All the characters in one set
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than I thought they would be. All the characters are true to the movie and the TV show. My five year old will love getting these for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Hours of content play time
customer_reviews.text: You should have seen the eyes light up of the little girl at this gift from Santa. These pony’s look so small in the add. They are each as big as an adult hand. They also provided hours of play time for this little 6 year old girl. They were a definitive hit!
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 5 birthday. She absolutely loved it! She LOVES my little pony, and these ponies are much bigger than the single ones you can buy. To me the bigger sizes, low price, and all of the ponies you get is a great value. They are great quality as well. They are played with daily and still look brand new! Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL PONIES/UNICORNS
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE BEAUTIFUL!!!! Both my 5 year old and my 1 year old adore these ponies. The colors are wonderful and they are so big...didn't expect that. They are also great for bath toy.
customer_reviews.author: sarah brown

customer_reviews.title: You can’t find these in store
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been into my little pony since she was born. 9 years later, you can’t find the pony’s like this in stores anymore. This is a real treat for her.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Leon

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these...
customer_reviews.text: How can you not love bright fun Ponies! They are a decent size for what you typically expect of a toy, which was actually great. It has all the core characters and then some. They are made well and are seemingly durable. All in all some really nice toys.
customer_reviews.author: llsnow

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale. I probably wouldn't have paid the full price, but these are super cute and the girls loved them. There are enough to share with friends and pretend. Really happy with this purchase. Good job, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mims

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ponies!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old granddaughter loves these ponies and plays with them all the time. Well made...great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of band for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Talk about value for your dollar. I gifted to one child and she and her sibling where happy to share because there were so many. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I was truly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves these ponies. She won’t put them down. They were a bit larger than I thought they would be and that makes them that much better. They appear to be durable and most importantly fun. I would purchase this set again if I needed a pony birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: FlightyBear

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: These are so much bigger than I had thought, my 3 year old is going to LOVE this come Christmas and I can’t wait to give them to her!
customer_reviews.author: mary k

customer_reviews.title: Great value, high quality
customer_reviews.text: These ponies are of high quality material and have nice hair with multiple accessories. I was surprised at the quality. My daughter has played with these every day since Christmas. This was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne1480

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Durable and great size. We had purchased the smaller ones at target and they fell sorry. These are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great MLP set!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this set has the whole "mane" crew. Saw it in store but it was cheaper here. Thinking about packing it away to see if it will be worth something someday. You never know!
customer_reviews.author: C.Dunn

customer_reviews.title: A favorite Christmas presentQ
customer_reviews.text: My grandchild was thrilled with this set. It gets played with constantly, with lots of imaginary scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: bamcooks

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t love these more for a MLP Lover
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my 3 year old age plays with them EVERY DAY. Cheaper here than any store I’ve seen. The hair doesn’t stay pretty very long but again they are well loved in our home
customer_reviews.author: NVK

customer_reviews.title: Great gift at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Little one loves these! Super obnoxious to get out of the box and a few ponies have crowns. Save yourself the trouble and "lose" them before your kiddo does.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri B.

customer_reviews.title: very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered, got within 48 hrs. Hope this toy set holds up. bought for my three year old granddaughter for this Christmas.2019.The pony set is exactly the way it looks online. VERY PLEASED!!!!!!!!!!!!Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger than anticipated (even though the details are accurate, seeing is believing) daughter absolutely went crazy for and loves this set so all in all a great success.
customer_reviews.author: JD_Justice

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them and they were $20 cheaper than target. I personally though the manes and tails were a little thin but she didnt mind at all.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a my little pony lover
customer_reviews.text: Love this pony set. Got it when it went on sale the bigger ponies are hard to come by lately.
customer_reviews.author: H0111

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are big and cute for a MLP fanatic toddler! Also a good deal rather than trying to buy them all separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and even saw it in the store, yet the size of it/them surprised me. Very good quality and size. Agree that it should come with a comb.
customer_reviews.author: moonhunt18

customer_reviews.title: 🐎 Pretty Perfect 🦄
customer_reviews.text: These ponies are huge! They totally are a handful in the very best way! They are colorful and fun. Love this set as it's all your favorite characters.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Whoa! Big ponies. Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Really good sized ponies. Only thing missing was Apple Jack's hat. Lots of play time recreating movie scenes and new stories
customer_reviews.author: The Ritchies

customer_reviews.title: They don't make noise
customer_reviews.text: The hair is un rubberbands when they show up so It's not a messy noisy toy. They look and feel really cheap so I don't feel bad if they get thrashed. As for a three-year-old? She dropped her happy meal and kicked off her boots in the middle of the living room to embrace all her new friends. The hair seems like barbie hair and might get ruined in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mikelang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and larger than I thought. Kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved them. Great quality and larger than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn (Iowa)

customer_reviews.title: Buy on sale!
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale for $32? And I wouldn’t pay more than that. They are great for that price, but I can already tell that the ponies hair will get wrecked quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mta

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled with these. They're very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Mularz

customer_reviews.title: What every My Little Pony lover needs.
customer_reviews.text: Not just my 3 year old daughters favorite ponies, they are her favorite toys. I had to get get a little purse to carry them around with her every where we go the ponies fallow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love these ponies
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 and 6 year old daughters loves these ponies, play with them. These are good quality, good size too.
customer_reviews.author: Eegii

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves these ponies. The are the perfect size, durable, and very well made(presentation). They were normally priced a bit high bit saw bought them when they went on sale.
customer_reviews.author: David Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Very neat
customer_reviews.text: These were huge. I loved them so did my 8year old. Very bright and pretty. Hair is tied so it stays nice for as long as the ties stay in
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mancilla

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves all of them. They are huge. 6 inches tall
customer_reviews.author: Laurinda

customer_reviews.title: Different hair from the set that comes without the three princesses and Spike
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, quality figures, but the hair is unmade and very quickly gets messy compared to the other set.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbird

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these for Christmas and loves them so much. They are large and great quality. She plays with them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jlc209

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved this as a Christmas gift. They were bigger then I thought (but I didn’t read the description) so they were well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3 year old and she loves them. They are much bigger than I thought they were going to be and are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great size for play
customer_reviews.text: These ponies are larger than normal but a perfect size to play with. They don't fit in the pony castle, but they are more fun to play with alone due to their size. It was a bonus for my niece that Princess Luna was part of the present. Overall she seems really happy about them.

customer_reviews.title: What a great set !!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect gift for a little girl ! So fun to play with !
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: One happy little lady

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect , my daughter should never lose these
customer_reviews.text: Loving everything about it , the size is amazing I know for sure my daughter will love it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for MLP fans

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: love it

customer_reviews.title: Great Size! You definitiely get your monies worth!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these ponies. They are a great quality and actually very large which was a bonus! Would definitely recommend for any pony lover out there.

customer_reviews.title: Pony
customer_reviews.text: Picture doesn’t do the figurines justice.. they are at least 3-4 inches tall maybe more.. worth the money
customer_reviews.author: alvaro amador

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but Otherwise Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, vibrant, durable toys. Other than the fact that these (along with every other toy) are super over-priced, they’re exactly what every My Little Pony fan could want. Both of my daughters have loved them.
customer_reviews.author: JuhDownes

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: They were the perfect gift for my niece whom is 3 yrs old. She love them the second she open them. :-)

customer_reviews.text: Ponies are soo much bigger than expected. They are huge. My 4 year old daughter loves them!...def worth the price point.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter pack!
customer_reviews.text: Ponies are much bigger than expected, but great for smaller hands, my little one went crazy for them!

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her my little pony set. These are easy to clean and keep track of. Extremely durable.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I expected!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these Little Ponies. They are the exact size I expected and in perfect condition. I would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice set! Good quality. Colors of the pony's are bright and overall they seem well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves my little pony and this set had all of them. We got a my little pony back pack to keep them in. I just with that Mattel sold clothes for the ponies

customer_reviews.text: Toys are just as expected and a good play size. I see lots of My little pony in my future.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Ponies are a great size for play. And all the main characters. My toddlers were thrilled! Price may seem high but compared to other items it’s not bad for the quality of these ponies!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike was Applejack didn't come with her cowgirl hat which my daughter noticed right away and I failed to notice it didn't come with it, but great quality and she loves them!

customer_reviews.text: This set was a big hit with my 3 year old granddaughter. I didn't pay attention to the size so was pleasantly surprised how large the ponies were.

customer_reviews.text: 1. Rainbow Dashes hair was not properly colored. Her full mane is fully rainbow it's not spread out between her mane and tail 2. AJ does not have a hat. AJ never goes anywere without her hat unless she is messing around with playing Fashion with Rarity.

customer_reviews.text: Very well made toys. My grandaughter opened the present on Christmas and loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Love them

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These ponies are awesome! They are just a little bigger then I was expecting them to be but the quality of these ponies is very good!! They are exactly what my daughter was wanting for her birthday and she absolutely loves them!! I'm so happy I was able to find all the ponies she wanted in one complete set!!! Thanks Amazon!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My twins loved these! And these are much better priced than Target. Very cute good quality ponies

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Daughter was thrilled. Plays with these day in and day out.

customer_reviews.title: Encourages hours of pretend play!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love them (3 & 4yr). Provides hours of pretend play. They love re-enacting scenes from My Little Pony. Easy to wipe clean.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful purchase! Nice material, very good quality! Just as shown in the images.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is gonna love it. Better to get the bundle

customer_reviews.text: My niece was so excited to see all these ponies on Xmas. Thank goodness for Cyber Monday. All of this for $36. Score!

product_meta.title: My Little Pony Friendship is Magic Toys Ultimate Equestria Collection – 10 Figure Set Including Mane 6, Princesses, and Spike the Dragon – Kids Ages 3 and Up
product_meta.description: Imagine magical adventures across Ponyville, Canterlot, and the Crystal Empire with My Little Pony friends! Inspired by the animated television series, My Little Pony Friendship is Magic, the Ultimate Equestria Collection includes 10 popular pony characters: Twilight Sparkle, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, Rarity, Applejack, Spike the Dragon, Princess Celestia, Princess Luna, and Princess Cadance figures. Ultimate Equestria Collection ponies have long, soft hair and each of the 3 princess dolls come with a removable tiara accessory. The Mane 6 and royal princess toys stand at 6 inches tall. Inspired by entertainment, the adorable Spike the Dragon figure is shorter than his pony friends at 4 inches tall. This 10-pack collection set is a great introduction for My Little Pony beginners ages 3 and up to grow new friendships within a beloved brand, and for fans looking to collect some of their favorite characters. My Little Pony and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Features 10 characters from My Little Pony Friendship is Magic: Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Fluttershy, Applejack, Spike the Dragon, Princess Celestia, Princess Luna, and Princess Cadance figures.
Each pony has a soft, colorful mane and tail for kids to play with. Comes with 3 removable princess tiara accessories.
6-inch tall pony toys are sculpted with fun poses and their signature cutie marks. Spike the Dragon figure is 4 inches tall.
Dolls inspired by the looks of beloved characters from the animated television series. Imagine adventures across Equestria
Collection makes a great holiday or birthday present for kids ages 3 years old and up who are fans of My Little Pony: The Movie and My Little Pony Friendship is Magic

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
